title: Toxic Vapors, Hypodermic Syringes and Needles
content:

§ 80.130 - Toxic solvents
§ 80.131 - Prescription, sale and possession of hypodermic syringes and hypodermic needles

§ 80.133 - Hypodermic syringes and needles; certificate of need

§ 80.135 - Authorization to conduct hypodermic syringe and needle exchange programs

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
